contexts.context: "I am Kena <mark>Zombel</mark> Mokafa, and I can prove that you do...
...lady Benitah has heard of the intelligence of Kena <mark>Zombel</mark> Mokafa, and has said that she was mistaken...
...that I had in Nimlom the Mighty, Kena <mark>Zombel</mark> Mokafa, or Master Vomph," replied a feminine...
